text_block_list.text: I had been sitting at my desk for a while, but I was still worried about Marvelous Sunday. I decided to go to the infirmary to check on her――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Haa…… Haa…… ……Ugh……

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Mmm…… mmmmm……

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Huh…… Trainer……? ……Ahaa, seems like, I'm still dreaming……

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: I'm glad…… being alone, isn't marvelous after all……
Maybe it's because she just woke up, but Marvelous Sunday seemed a little out of it. Wondering if she was okay, I talked to her because she seemed depressed.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm~…… a long time ago……the same dream I'd had while I was hospitalized…… It was dark……in a place where I couldn't see anything…… and very cold――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: I hated being alone, so I'd just start walking. I didn't know where to go, but I kept moving forward.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: When I did, eventually I could see a light far in the distance…… A warm looking place……if I went there, maybe I'd find someone to hold me tight――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Without realizing it, I started running. But that light kept getting further away…… No matter how much I wanted to go there, to reach it――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: I ran…… I ran with all my strength…… I just ran――!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: When I opened my eyes, Papa and Mama were crying. Grandma praised me, saying I had worked hard.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous' Grandmother
text_block_list.text: They told us you might not open your eyes again. But just like your name, you showed us a wonderful miracle……

text_block_list.name: Marvelous' Grandmother
text_block_list.text: Marvelous is a miracle――joy――a wonderous surprise. To us, you just being here is Marvelous, you know.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: That was when I realized it――!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Being born, being alive, running. Just sharing a connection with someone, that that would make everything more joyous for everyone.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: That something miraculous, that wonderful surprises exist! Even if you can't see or feel it, they're all around……!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Right! Marvelous is something special, amazing, a wonderful surprise! That's what I wanted to show Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Because showing everyone that kind of Marvelous is my dream☆ That's why I came to Tracen Academy, after all!
At some point, the strength had returned to her eyes. Maybe it was because she remembered her promise to show me what Marvelous was.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: You see, the world is filled with people like Trainer. Lots of people that don't realize what Marvelous is.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: It can't be seen so they don't know…… in that case, I want to show them! That's why I decided to enter races!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: There's alot of Marvelous things in races, after all☆ Passion……excitement……emotions, and many other special, wonderful surprises that can't be found elsewhere!
A wonderful surprise――if she put it that way, then I felt I could understand what 『Marvelous』 meant.
Like with the waxed hallway――
That Mystery Tea. You didn't know what flavor it had until you drank it. Marvelous Sunday considered all these little surprises to be something special.
I had thought my life was boring. But I never even tried to see the beauty in everyday life, thinking that I'd be disappointed if the world itself didn't shine.
But, there were many wonderful surprises in my life, and I just had to look for them. If I did, then my world would definitely shine!
Whether your days were exciting or unforgettable, it all depended on how you saw it. Even those days I spent thinking and worrying about the meaning of Marvelous――
Were fun…… those days after coming to Tracen were fulfilling! The thing I found marvelous――the wonderful surprise, was her!
I wanted the world to know about Marvelous Sunday. By supporting her, I wanted her feelings to reach everyone.
That the world around you is overflowing with marvelous things. If that's her dream――
choice_data_list: ……Will you let me help with that dream?
……Will you let me help with that dream?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Trainer is going to help!? But, but, how are you gonna do that!?
choice_data_list: Let me help with your training

text_block_list.text: Normally, this kind of talk would be accompanied by talks of a contract. But, if she wanted to show everyone that, she couldn't stay as she was.
First, we need to increase her strength so she doesn't collapse during training. If she wanted to show everyone what Marvelous was, it was necessary.
Maybe she'd be dissatisfied if she was told to hold back. Maybe it would feel a bit like a detour. But, Marvelous Sunday might understand.
After all, even during that rainy day, she was able to find something marvelous――

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Eh~, how? If it's raining this hard, we might not be able to train tomorrow either, you know? Maya wants to run!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: That's true, if you can't run because it's raining, it's boring, huh?☆ But if you wait, and wait, and wait a little more for the sun then――
Maybe by holding back on her desire to run during the rain, it would make the next time she was on the turf that much more exciting.
If the Marvelous she mentioned on that day was anything like that, maybe she'd understand what it meant to focus on efficiency to get better results later.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: You'll help me with training!? If you do, will I be able to show that special Marvelous to everyone!?
choice_data_list: You'll be able to for sure!

text_block_list.text: Her positivity would be a huge asset. If she could focus on that, she should be able to aim higher. Putting it that way――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Aim higher for a special Marvelous! If I show them that, then more people will realize what Marvelous is, right!?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Trainer! I want everyone to see it☆ A special Marvelous that only I can show them★☆★
I had Marvelous Sunday take a break――and then several days later. Once again I was on the training course with her.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haa……――Alright! On the next one, I'll use all of――☆
If she went all out here, nothing would change. The first thing she needed to learn was to manage her pace.
choice_data_list: Just maintain your speed for now!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's right! ……but, you see Trainer! It's strange, for some reason my heart won't stop beating!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: It just feels like that Marvelous feeling keeps building up☆ If I keep on building this up more and more then――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you're right! That's why right now……is the time to build up that Marvelous feeling!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: ――Then, Trainer, I'll be off☆
Just as I instructed, Marvelous Sunday was running while maintaining her speed.
It seems like even she felt something from this training. In that case, I had high expectations.
